May 6, 1979 D Weston-super-Mare (Second Section)
Weston-super-Mare (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Weston-super-Mare Contest weston-super-mare-second-section
Winter Gardens, Weston-super-Mare, Somerset, England, UK 1st prize - The Bailey Trophy and 30 2nd prize - The Prosser Trophy and 15 3rd prize - The Astill Trophy and 10
